# US Micro Products
> Custom display solutions manufacturer — Austin, TX — Est. 1996

US Micro Products is a fabless custom display manufacturer serving OEMs across medical, military, aerospace, industrial, automotive, and consumer markets. We design and deliver high-performance TFT LCD, AMOLED, PMOLED, character LCD, graphic LCD, smart display, touch panel, and open frame monitor solutions.

## Products
- 450+ active SKUs across 9 display technology categories
- Sizes from 0.96" to 84" diagonal
- Custom modifications: brightness, optical bonding, cover glass, interfaces, connectors

## Services
- EMS / PCB Assembly
- Display Integration & Bonding
- Inventory Management
- Logistics & Kitting

## Contact
- Website: https://www.usmicroproducts.com
- Quote requests: https://www.usmicroproducts.com/support/request-quote
- Email: info@usmicroproducts.com

## Structured Data
This site provides JSON-LD schema markup on all pages including Organization, Product, BreadcrumbList, and FAQPage schemas.
